comment: The word twat is widely used as a derogatory epithet, especially in British English, referring to a person considered obnoxious or stupid.
amr:

(u / use-01
      :ARG1 (w / word
            :mod (t / twat))
      :ARG2 (e / epithet
            :mod (d / derogatory)
            :ARG2-of (r / refer-01
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :ARG1-of (c / consider-01
                              :ARG2 (o / or
                                    :op1 (o2 / obnoxious)
                                    :op2 (s / stupid))))))
      :ARG1-of (w2 / wide-02)
      :medium (l / language
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "English")
            :mod (c2 / country
                  :name n
                  :op1 "Great"
                  :op2 "Britain"))
      :mod (e2 / especially))
